Membership
* These are the reasons why you should subscribe to LatinChain Platform by paying Pi each 30 days:
1.- You'll have access to many games, as Chess, Sudoku and Snake, with multilanguage interface.
2.- Your playing records will be saved in our servers, you can consult them anytime. After finish the subscription, your records would be hidden, but when you start the subscription again, your records will be shown again.
3.- You could earn prizes if you are one of the leaders. Read the Rules section for more info.
4.- You can stream your Youtube videos to the LatinChain community, being in the Top 50 streamers with more points.
5.- For an unverified user, Pi Ads will be displayed 1 ad each certain time (in the mainscreen will appears the specific time). For a verified user, Pi Ads only will be displayed if you do click on the Watch Pi Ads button, or activating automatic Pi Ads checkbox.
6.- In the mainscreen there will be a checkbox to activate or deactivate (only verified users) automatic Pi Ads.
* Additionally:
a.- You will can use RadioForUs and LatinChain with the same subscription of 30 days.
a.- You will can use RadioForUs and LatinChain with the same subscription of 30 days.
Rules
First Rule: Once you paid a monthly subscription, you'll have 30 days to enjoy LatinChain Platform and it won't be refunds.
* Rules to be verified:
()
1.- Each 30 days you should unlock the app paying Pi. Go to one of the games to do it. Once you pay in any of the games, it won't be refunded. When you Donate it's considered a donation and it won't be refunded either. You can also unblock the games, for 30 days since the payment date, with a donation. Although, all payments to LatinChain are considered donations.
2.- In the mainscreen of latin-chain.com (Mainnet) or test.latin-chain.com (Testnet), depending which version of LatinChain are you using, you can watch your available days.
3.- To unblock the apps, the payments must be done inside our Pi App. If the payment is made outside our Pi App, like Pi Wallet to Pi Wallet, the app won't be unblocked.
4.- If you don't want to renovate your subscription, you just need to wait the 30 days to finish and not pay Pi again. We will never use automatic charges over your Pi Wallet. Money won't be refunded.
* Rules to be in the Leaders Board:
1.- Be verified in LatinChain Platform.
2.- Be one of the first 50 users with more total points.
* Rules to be in the Top 10 Board:
1.- Be verified in LatinChain Platform.
2.- For Top 10 zone: Have 20 or more points in Chess, more than 18 points in Sudoku and more than 20 points in Snake, and have more than 200 in total points.
3.- For Top 10 zone Chess: Have 20 or more points in Chess.
4.- For Top 10 zone Snake: Have more than 20 points in Snake.
5.- For Top 10 zone Sudoku: Have more than 18 points in Sudoku.
* Rules to be in the Top 50 streamers (LatinChain dSocial):
1.- Be verified in LatinChain Platform.
2.- Add your Youtube video link at LatinChain dSocial (conf) on mainscreen.
3.- Be one of the first 50 users with more total points, who have added their Youtube video links.
4.- This list will be updated each 1 minute, so after you save your Youtube video link, you should wait 1 minute to be added on the list.
* Rules to be in the Global Ranking:
1.- All users, verified and not verified, in LatinChain Platform.
2.- Be one of the first 50 users with more total points.
3.- None prize is related to this specific list of users.
4.- This specific list of users is informational only.
5.- If you are in this specific list of users and want to earn prizes, you have to verify your user in LatinChain Platform, to appear in Leaders Board and Winners Board.
* Latin points:
Latin points are part of total points to be in Leaders Board. If you are in Leaders Board, then you could be in Winners Board to earn Pi prizes (To know more about Leaders Board and Winners Board, read about it in Rules section, and Winners Board and Prizes section, in this page).
Winners Board and Prizes
First Rule: Once you paid a monthly subscription, you'll have 30 days to enjoy LatinChain Platform and it won't be refunds.
* Rules to be in the Winners Board and win Prizes:
1.- Be verified in LatinChain Platform.
2.- Be in the first 10 on the Leaders Board or in the Top 10 Board (Top 10 zone, Top 10 zone Chess, Top 10 zone Snake or Top 10 zone Sudoku). It is filled automatically at 16:00 UTC.
3.- All prize payments will be paid automatically to your Pi Wallet associated in your Pi Browser.
4.- On OpenMainnet we will pay the 15th day of each month. Last payment was on UTC, next payment will be the 15th day of next month.
5.- If you are a winner on OpenMainnet, you will earn according to the income of LatinChain Platform, and not less than the minimum payment to unlock the games. Current minimum payment is at Pi, so you will earn not less than that. In a good situation we could pay the triple of minimum payment: Pi, or much more, depending on the income.
6.- Check in the Rules on latin-chain.com (Mainnet), to know the current minimum payment on our Mainnet server.
7.- Prizes will only be paid out if we reach at least 1000 verified users before the prize is paid out.
Levels
* Chess: Leaders Boards
1.- Chess has 20 levels.
2.- Draw is 1 point.
3.- The number of the level is the same amount of points. It means, winning in level 1, you will earn 1 point. Winning in level 2, you will earn 2 points. Winning in level 20, you will earn 20 points. And so.
4.- How to play Chess: Rules of Chess.
* Snake: Leaders Boards
1.- Each 10 foods achieved in Score, you will earn the Score/10.
2.- It means if you achieved 10 foods in Score, you will earn 1 point. If you achieved 20 foods in Score, you will earn 2 points. If you achieved 30 foods in Score, you will earn 3 points. And so.
3.- How to play Snake: Rules of Snake.
* Sudoku: Leaders Boards
1.- Sudoku has 4 levels.
2.- Winning in level 1, you will earn 3 points.
3.- Winning in level 2, you will earn 6 points.
4.- Winning in level 3, you will earn 9 points.
5.- Winning in level 4, you will earn 12 points.
6.- How to play Sudoku: Rules of Sudoku.
* Latin points
1.- Earn Latin points from Pi Ads and also paying Pi.
2.- You can exchange Latin points by Chess, Sudoku or Snake points, in mainscreen.
